replies.body: I upvoted cuz I found the meme funny but Urgot was broken for way too long and finally got what he deserved.

Getting dumpstered from top 10 top lane champions to bottom 3 in two patches with his only defensive ability as a juggernaut with no sustain or healing to speak of, high mana costs and low regen, reduced in power by over 50%, to the point where its not even worth its massive (and increased) cooldown and mana cost for the less than 100 HP shield and self slow it provides is not something any champion deserves.
At one point he was top 2. I think the nerfs ended up being too harsh, but they probably just overshot. Hopefully within the next few patches he gets some small compensation buffs.
Still better than tahm kench and gonna take a guess and say shen too

Urgot wasn't broken though, nor was he oppressive nor invalidating other laners.  Honestly, he was picked because he was a relatively safe and neutral pick, who could survive most match ups, even if he didn't win them.  He wasn't much of a counter to anyone, and he also had a good few counters himself (Sion, Quinn, Panth, Cam, Rumble, Riven, YORICK, Jax, Rammus, Yasuo, Olaf, Irelia, Vlad, Kled all had favorable match ups, positive winrates, and better team contributions than Urgot on average when picked against him top lane.  That list just happens to include many META soloqueue top laners, and its almost 15 champions out of roughly 60 commonly picked in top lane.)  Losing to 25% of the top lane roster in solo queue with less than 2% pickrate, and barely over a 50% winrate in plat+ did not at all warrant these levels of gutting, and especially not to his only survivability tool as a juggernaut who cannot build {{item:3053}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3748}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3022}}  effectively, who gets less out of {{item:3044}} /{{item:3071}}  than other juggernauts, and who cannot use Conqueror or Grasps of the Undying effectively either due to the fact that his paltry 300 range forces him to be treated as a ranged champion, while Irelia's 200 range (which is 25 longer than the juggernaut class who is supposed to outrange all other melee champions, and who were given 175 range intentionally to outrange 125 laners, due to the limitations put on juggernauts) does not.  Bonus points for him also being the only juggernaut now without high base sustain or a tool to provide healing/regen/lifesteal.
